title: Ticket #6083: condor_submit -i and condor_ssh_to_job surprises with Docker Universe
description:
If a docker universe job is running, a user can condor_ssh_to_job to it, but will only see the sandbox directory, not the rest of the filesystem namespace the job sees. We should log a warning to that effect.

Also, if a user condor_submit's -i with a submit file that is a docker universe job, it won't start a container at all, just a sleep job, which is surely what the user doesn't want. We will prevent this with a useful error.
